# Support

Thank you for using ResNet-BK! This document provides information on how to get help.

## Documentation

Before asking for help, please check our documentation:

- **README**: [README.md](../README.md) - Quick start and overview
- **Tutorial**: [TUTORIAL.md](../TUTORIAL.md) - Step-by-step guide
- **API Reference**: [API_REFERENCE.md](../API_REFERENCE.md) - Complete API documentation
- **FAQ**: [FAQ.md](../FAQ.md) - Frequently asked questions
- **Debugging Guide**: [DEBUGGING.md](../DEBUGGING.md) - Common issues and solutions
- **Online Docs**: https://resnet-bk.readthedocs.io

## Getting Help

### 1. Search Existing Resources

Before creating a new issue or discussion:

1. Search [existing issues](https://github.com/neko-jpg/Project-ResNet-BK-An-O-N-Language-Model-Architecture/issues)
2. Search [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/neko-jpg/Project-ResNet-BK-An-O-N-Language-Model-Architecture/discussions)
3. Check the [FAQ](../FAQ.md)
4. Check the [Debugging Guide](../DEBUGGING.md)

### 2. GitHub Discussions (Recommended)

For questions, ideas, and general discussion, use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/neko-jpg/Project-ResNet-BK-An-O-N-Language-Model-Architecture/discussions):

- **Q&A**: Ask questions about usage, implementation, or concepts
- **Ideas**: Share ideas for new features or improvements
- **Show and Tell**: Share your projects using ResNet-BK
- **General**: General discussion about the project

### 3. GitHub Issues

For bug reports and feature requests, create a [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/neko-jpg/Project-ResNet-BK-An-O-N-Language-Model-Architecture/issues):

- **Bug Report**: Report bugs or unexpected behavior
- **Feature Request**: Suggest new features or enhancements
- **Performance Issue**: Report performance problems
- **Documentation**: Report documentation issues

Please use the appropriate issue template and provide as much detail as possible.

### 4. Discord Community

Join our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/resnet-bk) for real-time chat:

- **#general**: General discussion
- **#help**: Get help from the community
- **#research**: Discuss research ideas and papers
- **#development**: Development and contribution discussion
- **#announcements**: Project announcements

### 5. Email Support

For private inquiries or security issues:
- General: arat252539@gmail.com
- Security: arat252539@gmail.com
- Conduct: arat252539@gmail.com

## What to Include

When asking for help, please include:

### For Questions

- What you're trying to do
- What you've already tried
- Relevant code snippets
- Error messages (if any)
- Your environment (OS, Python version, PyTorch version, etc.)

### For Bug Reports

- ResNet-BK version
- Python version
- PyTorch version
- CUDA version (if using GPU)
- Operating system
- Minimal reproducible example
- Full error message and stack trace
- Expected vs. actual behavior

### For Feature Requests

- Clear description of the feature
- Use case and motivation
- Proposed API (if applicable)
- Alternatives considered

## Response Time

- **GitHub Discussions**: Usually within 24-48 hours
- **GitHub Issues**: Usually within 48-72 hours
- **Discord**: Real-time (depends on community availability)
- **Email**: Usually within 3-5 business days

## Community Guidelines

Please follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) when interacting with the community.

## Contributing

If you'd like to contribute to the project, see [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md).

## Reporting Security Issues

If you discover a security vulnerability, please email arat252539@gmail.com instead of creating a public issue. See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for details.
